Package io.github.zero88.jooqx

Interface JooqxBase<S extends io.vertx.sqlclient.SqlClient>

Type Parameters:
S - Type of SqlClient, can be SqlConnection or Pool
All Superinterfaces:
JooqDSLProvider, SQLBatchExecutor, SQLBatchResultExecutor, SQLBlockExecutor, SQLDDLExecutor, SQLExecutor<S,io.vertx.sqlclient.Tuple,JooqxPreparedQuery,JooqxResultCollector>, SQLPlainExecutor, SQLQueryExecutor, SQLRoutineExecutor
All Known Subinterfaces:
Jooqx, JooqxConn, JooqxSession, JooqxTx
public interface JooqxBase<S extends io.vertx.sqlclient.SqlClient> extends SQLExecutor<S,io.vertx.sqlclient.Tuple,JooqxPreparedQuery,JooqxResultCollector>, SQLBatchResultExecutor
Represents for an executor that executes jOOQ query on Vertx reactive SQL connection
Since:
2.0.0
